page.title: 20 INDUSTRY
page.content: do it.The difference of the age of their machinary is from{1 year}to{30 {years. {Both}Clee Hill Plant and the Quarry get{burglars.} {Sheep,cows}and{ponies}wander in. This is because people who live on the common have{commoner's rights}so the quarry can not do anything about it. They can't even put a fence round. Once there were{4}quarries that went by the names of:{Dhustone, {Granite,Titterstone}and{Belfry. {Dhustone}is the only quarry used nowadays,though. { } Although they work close together, Clee Hill Plant and the quarry are different firms and therefore do not get together to do anything. { } The name of the quarry is the{ {A.R.C.}And that is all we asked{ {Mr.Reed. }
